de.geofencing.database

Class GeofencingDBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.database.GeofencingDBConnector

  • public class GeofencingDBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to execute CRUD-operations on the MongoDB Uses Mongo Java Driver (Needs mongo-java-driver-3.4.2.jar or newer)
    Author:
    Markus Thral

                                   SystemBeacons beacons)
                            throws NotFoundException
        Updates beacons in range of the Device
        Parameters:
        deviceID - DeviceID of the Device
        beacons - SystemBeacons object with beacons to be updated
        Returns:

        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if deviceID not existing
